name: src/state-manager.mjs
StateManager
description: A class representing a state machine manager.

unknown.tagValue: StateManager does not have a license at this time. For licensing contact the author

name: states
description: An object containing all the registered states.

name: currentState
description: The current state of the state machine.

name: constructor
description: Creates a new state machine manager.

params.name: pStates
params.description: Array of state objects to register.

name: logger
description: The logger module this module uses to log errors / logs.

name: registerState
description: Registers a new state with the state machine.

name: setState
description: Sets the current state of the state machine.

params.name: pName
params.description: The name of the state to set.

params.name: pRest
params.description: The arguments that were passed when setting this state.

name: update
description: Updates the current state of the state machine.

params.name: pDelta
params.description: The delta time since the last update in seconds.

params.name: pDelta
params.description: The delta time since the last update in seconds.
